title: 3 and Out - Rodgers to Broncos Breadcrumbs, Latest Coach/GM Hires, AFC and NFC Championship Preview, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Rodgers to Broncos Breadcrumbs, Latest Coach/GM Hires, AFC and NFC Championship Preview, Mailbag
description:
John discusses if the Broncos hiring Packers OC Nathaniel Hackett will help Denver and Aaron Rodgers, and reacts to the most recent head coach and GM hires around the league, including the Giants, Bears, and Vikings moves. He also previews the Niners/Rams and Bengals/Chiefs conference championship matchups, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
